Package presentation.block

Class SingleSurroundBlockPresentation

java.lang.Object
presentation.block.PresentationBlock<SingleSurroundingBlock>
presentation.block.SingleSurroundBlockPresentation
public class SingleSurroundBlockPresentation
extends PresentationBlock<SingleSurroundingBlock>
Handles the UI drawing and interaction for the SingleSurroundingBlock.
Version:
4.0
Author:
Andreas Awouters Thomas Van Erum Dirk Vanbeveren Geert Wesemael
